title: Office Confessions: Favors
description: "Anna has a high-pressure career and an even higher sex drive, and sometimes her battery-powered buddy Mr. Chocolate just isn't the right man for the job. Luckily, Anna's two incredibly hot best friends, Dale and Cole, are around to help her out when the going gets tough. Anna's sexy and titillating adventures take her from the heights of self-pleasure to the thrill of illicit workplace encounters, as flirting and friendship turns into erotic experimentation and Anna discovers that, when you really need that itch scratched, sometimes all it takes is a favor from a good friend to get you through." Warning: This book contains hot steamy workplace encounters, friendship experimentation and sexy self discovery.
author: Marie Deen
